messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] extended nursing/tv
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/19/00 7:55:58 AM Eastern Daylight Time, benliam@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/19/00 7:55:58 AM Eastern Daylight Time, benliam@...
writes:

<< BTW, lots of extended nursing in our house too. My son is 3 and almost 2
months and still nurses to nap and sleep. It has really cut down since last
year at this time. He is a spirited/high need child, and the nursing has
really helped him to have a secure base. And helped me calm him down of
course!
>>
How lucky you are! My spirited/high need child weaned herself at 27months
when I was pregnant with my son....oooohhh how I wish we still had that
wonderful tool!

Julie
